title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Fire Dispatch
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Fire in the Parks     Fire Operations and Crews     Fire Dispatch                Fire Dispatch       Daily Situation Report   Today's Date: August 12, 2016  Fire Danger Rating: Very High   Preparedness Levels National: 3 Ash Mountain: 1 Geographic Area: 3   Staffing Levels Ash Mountain: 3 Grant Grove: 3 Cedar Grove: 3   Fuels Burn Index (BI) / Energy Release Components Ash Mountain BI: 208 Grant Grove ERC: 79 Cedar Grove BI: 70   District Duty Officers Sequoia District: DIV-1 Kings Canyon District: DIV-2           National Fire Status - Situation Report  Geographic Area Situation Report    Fire Weather Forecast     Fire Resource Status        The Current Fire Information page can provide updates on fires in the parks. Visit our Main Fire Page to learn more about the Fire and Aviation Management Program in Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks
